    • Method Detail

      • sendEmail

        public Map<String,String> sendEmail(String senderEmail,
                           String appPassword,
                           String recipientEmail,
                           String subject,
                           String body,
                           String htmlContent,
                           List<String> attachments)
        Sends an email using IceWarp settings.
        Specified by:
        sendEmail in class EmailStratergy
        Parameters:
        senderEmail - The sender's email address.
        appPassword - The application password or authentication token.
        recipientEmail - The recipient's email address.
        subject - The email subject.
        body - The email body.
        htmlContent - The HTML content of the email (optional).
        attachments - The list of file paths to be attached (optional).
        Returns:
        A map containing information about the email sending status.
